  • Method Details

    • generateUID

      public static String generateUID(PersonnelFileType personnelFileType)
      Generates a unique ID (UID) for the personnel based on their type.
      Parameters:
      personnelFileType - the type of personnel (Admin, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist)
      Returns:
      a unique UID string for the personnel

    • addPersonnel

      public static boolean addPersonnel(HMSPersonnel personnel)
      Adds a new personnel (e.g., Doctor, Patient, etc.) to the system.
      Parameters:
      personnel - the personnel to be added
      Returns:
      true if personnel is successfully added, false if the data is invalid

    • removePersonnel

      public static boolean removePersonnel(String UID, PersonnelFileType type)
      Removes a personnel member from the system based on their UID and type.
      Parameters:
      UID - the UID of the personnel to be removed
      type - the type of personnel (Admin, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist)
      Returns:
      true if personnel is successfully removed, false if UID is invalid or personnel not found

    • getPersonnelByUID

      public static HMSPersonnel getPersonnelByUID(String UID, PersonnelFileType type)
      Retrieves a personnel member based on their UID and type.
      Parameters:
      UID - the UID of the personnel to retrieve
      type - the type of personnel (Admin, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist)
      Returns:
      the personnel object if found, or null if not found

    • updatePersonnel

      public static boolean updatePersonnel(String UID, HMSPersonnel updatedPersonnel)
      Updates the details of a personnel member based on their UID.
      Parameters:
      UID - the UID of the personnel to update
      updatedPersonnel - the new personnel data
      Returns:
      true if the personnel is successfully updated, false otherwise

    • listAllPersonnel

      public static void listAllPersonnel(PersonnelFileType type)
      Lists all personnel of a specific type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of personnel to list (Admin, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist)

    • getPatientById

      public static Patient getPatientById(String UID)
      Retrieves a patient by their UID.
      Parameters:
      UID - the UID of the patient to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Patient object if found, or null if not found

    • updatePatientParticulars

      public static boolean updatePatientParticulars(String UID, Patient updatedPatient)
      Updates a patient's particulars by UID.
      Parameters:
      UID - the UID of the patient to update
      updatedPatient - the updated patient details
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise
